item.title: The 20 Best ‘How I Met Your Mother’ Episodes, Ranked From Great to Legendary
item.description: “How I Met Your Mother” celebrates its 20th birthday this month. The iconic sitcom premiered on Sept. 19, 2005, when creators Craig Thomas and Carter Bays introduced the world to Ted Mosby
